title: Film language: the director's choice
creator_credit: Corey Shaff, BBC, KCET (Television station : Los Angeles, Calif.) and New York Center for Visual History
brief_description:
Episode number 11 of Series “American cinema”.
Illustrates basic terms such as tracking shots and zooms and provides a primer on editing techniques.
creator_credit_for_label: Corey Shaff, BBC, KCET (Television station : Los Angeles, Calif.) and New York Center for Visual History
